{{Infobox Political post |post = Mayor |body = Tehran |insignia = Tehran Logo.png |insigniasize = 100px |insigniacaption = Official emblem |image = Ghalibaf.jpg |incumbent = [[Mohammad-Bagher Ghalibaf]] |incumbentsince = September 17, 2005 |appointer = [[City Council of Tehran|City Council]] |termlength = Five year |formation = 1908 |residence = Shahrdari's Building |inaugural = Khalil Khan Saghfi |website = http://www.tehran.ir }} The '''Mayor of [[Tehran]]''' is an elected politician who, along with the Tehranâs [[City Council of Tehran|City Council]] of 21 members, is accountable for the strategic government of Tehran. Since 17 September 2005, [[Mohammad-Bagher Ghalibaf]] holds the position. Previously, the position was held by [[Mahmoud Ahmadinejad]], the current [[President of Iran|Iranian President]].
== List == === Mayors appointed by Ministers of Interior === * Dr. Khalil-Khan Saghfi Alam-Edoleh (1908â1910) * Mirza Abbaskhan Mohandes Bashi Hodud (1910â1913) * Ebrahim-Khan Yomn-Olsaltaneh Monaghah (1914â1920) * Seyed Zia-Edin Tabatabai (1920â1923)
=== Mayors appointed by Governors ===
* General Bozaar Jomehri (1923â1934) * General Gholi Hooshmand (1934â1938) * Ghasem Soor-Esrafil (1938â1940) * Ali Asghar Foruzan (1940â1941) * Mostafa Gholi Ram (1941) * Mohammad Sadjadi (1941â1942) * Seyed Mehdi Emadolsaltaneh (1942â1943) * Fazlollah Bahrami (1943) * Abbasgholi Golshaeeyan (1943â1944) * Gholam-Hossein Ebtehaj (1944â1945) * Mahmood Nariman (1945) * Mehdi Mashayekhi (1945â1947) * Dr. Mohammad Khalatbari (1947) * Hesamedin Dolatabadi (1947â1949) * Mohammad Mehran (1949â1950) * Dr. Mehdi Namdar (1950â1951) * Arsalan Khalatbari (1951) * Mohammad Mehran (1951â1952) * Nostratollah Amini (1952â1953) * Mohsen Nasr (1953) * General Mohammad-Ali Saffari (1953â1954) * Gholam-Hossein Ebtehaj (1954â1955) * Nosratollah Montasser (1955) * Timsar Mahmood Davaloo (1957â1958) * Mousa Maham (1958â1959) * Nasser Zolfaghari (1959â1960) * Fathollah Forood (1960â1961) * Mohsen Nasr (1961â1962) * Ahmad Nafisi (1962â1963) * Ali Akbar Tavana (1963) * Dr. Ziaedin Shademan (1963â1965) * Mohandes Taghi Sarlak (1965â1967) * General Mohammad-Ali Saffari (1967) * Manoochehr Pirooz (1967â1968) * Javad Shahrestani (1968â1969) * Gholamreza Nikpey (1969â1977) * Javad Shahrestan (1977â1979) * Mohammad Tavasoli (1979â1980) * Seyed Reza Zavarehi (1980) * Seyed [amal ol-din Neek Ravesh (1980â1981) * Gholam-Hossein Deljoo (1981â1982) * Mohammad Kazem Seyfian (1982â1983) * Hossein Bonakdar (1983) * Mohamad Nabi Habibi (1983â1987) * Seyed Morteza Tabatabaei (1987â1988)
